content.en: Paul Girard will participate to the software and Digital Humanities II symposium organized at Institut d'Études Avancées de Paris. It will take place on Tuesday 24th of May 2016, 9h-18h30, Hôtel de Lauzun 17 quai d'Anjou 75004 Paris. He will present how the Information Technology Engineering and Information Design can contribute to create Softwares as research instruments for Social Sciences.

title.en: Symposium on Software and Digital Humanities II
